column2: IDEA-200509 - More suggested types of constructor method references

column3:
Hi,
pls take a look at ticket https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-200509 ... what do you think about changes?
Thx,
Ivos

Thanks for the PR! I've fixed a bug which lead to incorrectly processing of constructors and as you've suggested started to process all available overloads for methods and constructors. In order to ensure that I don't break your idea, I copied the test data from this PR though the code is now completely different so it's committed separately as 40a9a6f, will be available on github shortly
cool, it was fun to help :) ivos
ahh i see... i like that overloads change and usage of getElementFactory().createExpressionFromText (much better than mine Main class "hack").
The test data is always very helpful, many thanks for it.

The Main class is totally ok if there are more or less complex situations (like with foo::foo actually) but when the expressions are nearly context independent, I think that explicit creation looks better.
Sorry, that I commit from my name, it would probably better to get your commit and then refactor but it looked too complicated from the first glance.
no problem i am signed for this PR :)
i did not noticed that overloads and have refactored it without that knowledge, thats why it looked complicated - to return it "back".
IDEA-200509 - More suggested types of constructor method references
